item.description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
UPDATE: We have enough paid members to hold this Meetup, so I will see you all tomorrow!!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~



Hi!

Long time, no see!

Sorry I haven't scheduled any Meetups for a month (or two?) but I'm getting back on track now.

This month (well, October), the location is going to be Creature Comforts in Salem. This is the location we used to go to, not the new one. Please read all the details of this event below and be sure you understand them.

IMPORTANT:

We will have to pay $10 per family (regardless of number of people or dogs) in ADVANCE. We have to make sure we'll have enough people to make it worth the owner's while to open for us. If by Thursday evening, I do not have 5 people signed up and paid, the event will be cancelled. (And in which case, your money will be refunded.) You can pay me with PayPal (if you pay with PayPal, the cost is $10.61 because of their fee, and if we cancel, you will receive $10.00 back) or mail me a check, but payment must be received NLT Thursday, 10/1.


In addition, if you need to cancel after paying, the fee will be refundable only if you cancel by Thursday. In other words, you MUST notify me by Thursday, 10/1, if you cannot make it or I will not be able to refund your money.

Please contact if you have any questions at all about the details of this Meetup.

I hope everyone can make it!

Thanks!
-laura

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: North Shore Cavalier King Charles Spaniel October Meetup
